SourceProxy.name: Friends-Of-Friends Halo Finder
SourceProxy.label: Friends-Of-Friends Halo Finder

Documentation.long_help: Finds groups of particles, defined to be haloes each within a specified linking length of each other
Documentation.short_help: Finds haloes via the friends-of-friends algorithm.

SourceProxy.Documentation: More documentation can be listed here

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates in which array the global ids are stored, required if running in parallel, otherwise not used. These global ids can be generated by D3, the Tipsy Reader, or read in as an additional attribute.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LinkingLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the linking length this halo finder will use.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinimumNumberOfParticles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the minimum number of particles to consider a halo. Default is 50.
